Class ServiceEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.adaptive.arp.api.APIBean
      • me.adaptive.arp.api.ServiceEndpoint

  • public class ServiceEndpoint
extends APIBean
    Structure representing a remote or local service access end-point.
